jsonld.name: Truth Locus
jsonld.description: The experience of recognizing that multiple, potentially contradictory statements can each be "true" within their own distinct contextual or framework-specific locus, without any inherent need for resolution or hierarchy among them. It is the absence of a single, unified truth-space where all facts must ultimately cohere.
